Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.

After many years, I rediscover an old project of a Part-API for KSP  https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/89296-ksp-api

For presenting the project, it's a web-API which parse all config parts files ( stock or mods) and expose a web services of this data. The goal are to provide an source of data for "off-game" project.

I rework on this and update it to 1.4.x parts.

So if someone are interesting, stay tune

 

DrDam

You can found a first test version here : http://kspapi.chezdamien.net

 

I'll translate documentation soon.

The big work remain are "explaining" some "array of float" in many modules...

Edited April 24, 2018 by DrDam

Hi all,

I just update the Api service : http://kspapi.drdamlab.net/

You can now found :

  • Documentation in english
  • Services for searching parts between many criteria ( category, tech needed ...)
  • Services for getting part data with different level of "volume of data"
  • Services for getting "strings" from dictionaries, ( because "autoLOC_500178" don't speek, "Heat Shield (0.625m)" a little more)

 

Thanks for your interest

Hi all,

 

Just an update on the API.

I just add some "collection" callback, they help you retrieving "filtered parts" with some computed fields ( for engine, Thrust for each ISP value on curve).

Actually the two only collection are "engines" and "fuelTanks".

If you need more, call me.

 

Thanks for you interest

DrDam

Hi all

 

Another update here, I have add some new collection ( Separators, Adapters) and some new stack item to the parsing.

 

Thanks tor your interest

 

DrDam
A little update with a new collection with "couplers"
